5. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.

Yes

6. Feeling tired or having little energy.

7. Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.

13. Had thoughts of being rejected, humiliated, embarrassed, ridiculed, or offending others.

14. Felt a racing heart, sweaty, trouble breathing, faint, or shaky.
